EnemyInfo.Name: Yapping Maw
EnemyInfo.Description: Stretchy worm with mandibles that is attatched to the the ground.

Property.Name: Proximity
Property.Description: Pixel radius for the yapping maw to try to grab samus. This has a minimum value of 0x0020.

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Direction for the yapping maw to face.
